import "./post.css" import {MoreVert} from "@material-ui/icons" import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; export default function Post({post}) { const user = Users.filter(u=>u.id===1); console.log(user[0]) return (
Eijun Sawamura {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} likes
{post.comment} comment
) }
